title: Buffs

properties.name: description
properties.value: Buffs and debuffs are changes to an individual's capabilities. They include activated prayers and changes in levels of combat skills. A positive change is called a buff, and a negative change a debuff.

content:
This article or section requires a cleanup in order to meet the Old School RuneScape Wiki's quality standards.
Reason: Improve readability
You can edit this page to improve it.
"Buff" redirects here. For changes made to RuneScape, see Updates. However, for equipment/items triggering on their own when equipped, see Passive effect.

Buffs and debuffs are changes to an individual's capabilities. They include activated prayers and changes in levels of combat skills. A positive change is called a buff, and a negative change a debuff.

Buffs[edit | edit source]

Buffs are changes to a character that enhance a player, whether it be by raising skill level or helping the player in some other way. The following are classed as buffs:

  • Temporary skill boosts (e.g. anglerfish, potions, etc.)
  • Prayers
    • Overhead prayers
    • Protection prayers
  • Equipment Stats
  • Item effects
  • Set effects
  • Special attacks
  • Skilling
    • Dragon axe/pickaxe/harpoon special attacks
    • Skillcape perks
    • Experience-boosting sets
    • Weight-reducing clothing
  • Power-ups (most notably Nightmare Zone power-ups)

Debuffs[edit | edit source]

Debuffs are changes to a character that weakens a player, whether it be by lowering a skill or inhibiting the player in some other way. The following are classed as debuffs:

  • Status effects
    • Stun
    • Poison
    • Venom
    • Disease
This article is a stub.
A stub is an article which does not cover all information available about the topic. You can help by expanding it.

'''Buffs''' and '''debuffs''' are changes to an individual's capabilities. They include activated [[prayers]] and changes in levels of combat skills. A positive change is called a buff, and a negative change a debuff.

=== Buffs ===
Buffs are changes to a character that enhance a player, whether it be by raising skill level or helping the player in some other way. The following are classed as buffs:

*[[Temporary skill boost|Temporary skill boosts]] (e.g. [[anglerfish]], [[potions]], etc.)
*[[Prayers]] 
**[[Overhead prayers]]
**[[Protection prayers]]
*[[Equipment Stats]]
*Item effects
*[[Set effect]]s
*[[Special attacks]]
*[[Skilling]]
**[[Dragon axe]]/[[Dragon pickaxe|pickaxe]]/[[Dragon harpoon|harpoon]] special attacks
**[[Skillcape perks]]
**[[Experience-boosting set]]s
**[[Weight-reducing clothing]]
*Power-ups (most notably [[Nightmare Zone]] [[Nightmare Zone#Power-ups|power-ups]])

=== Debuffs ===
Debuffs are changes to a character that weakens a player, whether it be by lowering a skill or inhibiting the player in some other way. The following are classed as debuffs:

*[[Status effects]]
**[[Stun (status)|Stun]]
**[[Poison]]
**[[Venom]]
**[[Disease]]
